originalText.text: An oasis of calm in the bustling mall! The IV drips are my favorite, though I've been wanting to try a sauna. I love the private rooms for my drip, you can work or nap. Plus, I always grab a Kin and a new skincare product to try when I'm done. Whenever I don't know what to get, I ask a team member and they always point me to the perfect thing.

text.text: An oasis of calm in the bustling mall! The IV drips are my favorite, though I've been wanting to try a sauna. I love the private rooms for my drip, you can work or nap. Plus, I always grab a Kin and a new skincare product to try when I'm done. Whenever I don't know what to get, I ask a team member and they always point me to the perfect thing.

originalText.text:
I come to the Brookfield location for infrared treatment all the time. I have 13 check ins on Yelp and I don’t even check in every time.

Today I booked a 45 min session at 2:15. However, five minutes into the session, the sauna shut off. The staff agreed that that was not supposed to happen and that they had never witnessed that before. I spent fifteen minutes waiting outside while multiple staff members tried to fix it. After they fixed it, they reset the timer to 45 minutes and told me to call them if it happened again. Then, towards the end, with ten minutes left, the sauna shut down randomly again. I went to call for help again and then they said that it was because the time was up which it was not. They apologized and added fifteen minutes to the timer, but the sauna was no longer at the correct temperature. As a result I became late to my next obligations because this added an extra half hour to something I had budgeted 45 minutes for. And then most shockingly of all, when I was leaving, the staff had the audacity to tell me that they had to tell me for safety reasons I had been in there too long, when it is a matter of basic math. I had to come out twice for fifteen minutes each, plus the 45 minutes - that's an hour and fifteen minutes.

I told them that I would not be paying for this session and they said that they were charging me anyway.

Awful staff.

originalText.text: I love this place (going for infrared sauna)! The staff is so nice and helpful and prepare the rooms with much care. Interior is amazing. I also love being able to leave relaxed and not been given a sales talk about memberships etc. 10/10, definitely coming back!

text.text: I love this place (going for infrared sauna)! The staff is so nice and helpful and prepare the rooms with much care. Interior is amazing. I also love being able to leave relaxed and not been given a sales talk about memberships etc. 10/10, definitely coming back!

originalText.text: I liked my first time time at Clean Market Brookfield Place. It’s been open for 2 years, mocated on the 2nd floor. It’s clean and welcominh. I went for a cryotheraphy session

originalText.text: I love all the offerings here and I’m particularly obsessed with the fact that there’s a Matchaful cafe in this space!! Awesome partnership
